extendedInfo.description: Generates random numbers based on a given range. Great for randomly choosing things. Need to decide who goes first? Pick a number and let the Quick Random Number Generator decide for you! Generate as many random numbers as you need at the same time!

reviews.title: Useful, but could be better
reviews.comment: Although it is a useful app, I only give it 3 stars, because first it does not remember settings after restarting the app, second there is no way to copy the result to clipboard, and I also think its way too simple to justify apps.
reviews.author: Florian Nairolf

reviews.title: Functional but ugly...
reviews.comment: Could be a brilliant app if the random number would display big and bold at full screen. Is shaking the phone to generate an option yet?
reviews.author: Ryan Heyworth

reviews.title: basic usage ok, but not configurable
reviews.comment: I need to generate a list of unique numbers. The only way to do it seems to be to generate a longer list, and remove the duplicates myself. I\'d also prefer to know what algorithm is used.  On the plus side, the interface is simple and easy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Giving double numbers
reviews.comment: I like it but is getting double numbers will you please fix
reviews.author: Jesse Espinoza

reviews.title: Remove duplicate numbers check box
reviews.comment: Emailed dev
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not very random
reviews.comment: Numbers seem to repeat too often. Might have a common programming mistake where the random seed is reinitialized every time, preventing you from ever moving past the first entry in three pseudo random table.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Needs an export function and needs to not stop while the app is closed. It generates pretty fast. Takes very little room and has a ton of power. Little needs from the app and gives fun lol. Just add the 2 features and it is prefect. If there is anyway to male it faster, please do so.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: I got some really weird numbers when I entered 0 and 1.0 for the range on my DROIDX
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could do with an export function
reviews.comment: This is awesome at the one basic task that it does but the programmers missed a trick by having no visible means of exporting the long list of random numbers this can generate.  That\'s the needed feature. Other features I would like would be some extra maths functions. So support for \'random prime numbers\' and support for non-integers would be examples of what I\'m talking about.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Fast does exactly as promised with a clear and flexible interface, not that pretty but lightweight and very effective.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Faar from random
reviews.comment: It seems to have some algorithm to mimic random sequence, but it\'s awfully repetitive. Plus, if your phone\'s screen went to sleep, when you first tap onto \'generate\', after wakeup, it flashes the button like it generated a new number, but it always stays the same, unchanged. The export feature is neat though. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple. Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: K.I.S.S.
reviews.comment: Not fancy or flashy, but it gets the job done perfectly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does the job
reviews.comment: Picks random numbers. Enough said! Xperia S is awesome for the record.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does the job, many numbers
reviews.comment: Havnt tested the true randomness, but seem random enough. If using for Keno, beware some combos have duplicate values, ex:3,45,77,1,45 for 5 spots.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Superb! I like it. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same numbers
reviews.comment: Clean and simple. I just wish there was an option to only use a number once in the result.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Does what it says
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice and simple
reviews.author: A Google User
